mapper.select: insert into summoner(summoner_name, id, accountid, puuid, profileiconid, summonerlevel, revisiondate, userid) values(#{summoner_name}, #{id}, #{accountId}, #{puuid}, #{profileiconId}, #{summonerLevel}, #{revisionDate}, #{userid})
insert into ranked_solo(id, queueType, tier, tier_rank, leaguePoints, wins, losses, rate) values(#{id}, #{queueType}, #{tier}, #{tier_rank}, #{leaguePoints}, #{wins}, #{losses}, #{rate})
insert into ranked_flex(id, queueType, tier, tier_rank, leaguePoints, wins, losses, rate) values(#{id}, #{queueType}, #{tier}, #{tier_rank}, #{leaguePoints}, #{wins}, #{losses}, #{rate})
update ranked_solo set tier = #{tier}, tier_rank = #{tier_rank}, leaguePoints = #{leaguePoints}, wins = #{wins}, losses = #{losses}, rate = #{rate} where id = #{id}
update ranked_flex set tier = #{tier}, tier_rank = #{tier_rank}, leaguePoints = #{leaguePoints}, wins = #{wins}, losses = #{losses}, rate = #{rate} where id = #{id}
